message_1: What are the products formed when solid mercury (II) oxide (HgO) is thermally decomposed? Also, write a balanced chemical equation for the process.
message_2:
When solid mercury (II) oxide (HgO) is thermally decomposed, the products formed are elemental mercury (Hg) and oxygen gas (O2). The balanced chemical equation for the process is:
